metadata.name: Megaplex Pass
metadata.description:
Megaplex Theatres' NFT
When movie fans mint or purchase, the Megaplex NFT they get access to a variety of benefits and perksâ€”including a limited edition refillable popcorn bucket, community events, and more! Connecting to your MyMegaRewards account, this NFT acts like a membership card allowing Megaplex NFT holders to verify their elite status and access perks!
